programme.title: Ghosts S4
programme.desc: GHOSTS is a comedy about Samantha and Jay who decided to convert a huge estate they inherited into a bed & breakfast - only to find it's inhabited by the many spirits who now call it home.

programme.title: The Goldbergs S1
programme.desc: Micromanaging Barry and Erica's college searches pits Beverly against a rival meddling mom. Erica tells Pops that her efforts to enhance her college prospects are based on lies.

programme.title: Fire Country S3
programme.desc: Fire Country season 3 isn't turning down the heat - Bode faces tougher challenges which will force him to walk the straight and narrow in this unfair world.

programme.title: Chicago Fire S12
programme.desc: Severide steps in as ranking officer at 51. Kidd fights to save her Girls on Fire program. Cruz’s family is threatened when someone from Javi’s past resurfaces.

programme.title: Chicago P.D. S11
programme.desc: Upton becomes consumed with a decades-old missing person’s case linked to Petrovic after a young child shows up at the district seeking help.

programme.title: Entertainment Tonight
programme.desc: The foremost authority on breaking entertainment news since its debut, ENTERTAINMENT TONIGHT is the No. 1 syndicated entertainment newsmagazine in the world.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen S23
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay plans a day of surprises for the Final Three chefs before they compete in their last challenge of the season.

programme.title: Alert: Missing Persons Unit S2
programme.desc: The MPU team finally gets justice for solving the Martiz bombing case.

programme.title: Matlock S1
programme.desc: Follows Madeline "Matty" Matlock as she rejoins the work force at a prestigious law firm, where she uses her unassuming demeanor and wily tactics to win cases and expose wrong doing.

programme.title: Fire Country S3
programme.desc: Fire Country season 3 isn't turning down the heat - Bode faces tougher challenges which will force him to walk the straight and narrow in this unfair world.

programme.title: Below Deck S10
programme.desc: The crew get a day off to explore St. Lucia on board a catamaran which takes them on a deep-sea adventure to see the Pitons up close and personal.

programme.title: Lopez Vs Lopez S2
programme.desc: As part of Alcoholics Anonymous, George makes amends with everyone except Oscar, who seeks an apology at a football game, but a run-in with Marshawn Lynch fumbles the plan; Mayan and Quinten try to spark Rosie's love life but end up getting burned.

programme.title: Survivor S47
programme.desc: The fallout from tribal council leaves one castaway feeling like they are on the outs. During the reward challenge tribes must shoot their shot to land a win and earn an advantage.

programme.desc: The foremost authority on breaking entertainment news since its debut, ENTERTAINMENT TONIGHT is the No. 1 syndicated entertainment newsmagazine in the world.

programme.title: Celebrity Wheel Of Fortune S4
programme.desc: Hosted by Pat Sajak and Vanna White, "Celebrity Wheel of Fortune" welcomes celebrities to solve word puzzles for a chance to win up to $1 million. All of the money won goes to a charity of their choice.

programme.title: Password US S2
programme.desc: The second season of Password will keep the classic format that we all know and love, while adding some new gameplay elements.
